item.title: EFS Burst Mode Credit Exhaustion Countermeasures Memo.
item.description: Intro EFS Burst Mode Credit Exhaustion Countermeasures Memo. I will provide the countermeasures I took as a memo since I was using EFS in burst mode and my credits were running low. Technical Elements EFS aws Two Modes of EFS EFS has two modes: Burst Mode (General Purpose) and Provisioned Mode. Burst Mode automatically adjusts the traffic based on the amount of storage used and can handle temporary increases in traffic.
